MathMLElementMfenced.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The <mfenced> MathML element provides the possibility to add custom opening and closing brackets (such as parenthese) and separators (such as commas or semicolons) to an expression.

blockquote.para: Note: Historically, the <mfenced> element was defined as a shorthand for writing fenced expressions and equivalent to an expanded form involving {{MathMLElement("mrow")}} and {{MathMLElement("mo")}} elements. Nowadays, it is recommended to use that equivalent form instead.
